name: KGRIP
description:
KGRIP is a game about gripping your keyboard as hard as you possibly can.

You have to use the keys in a fast-paced manner to hook some falling blocks which you can only destroy when all of your squares assemble them. Good luck, and remember, they are stronger together!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam.

As we were trying to port the game to WebGL, We encountered an issue. The game is only downloadable for now. We shall add a WebGL version shortly. Stay Tuned! Sorry for causing such inconvenience.

Disclaimer: The design of this game was a challenge. It had to be made using only squares. Hope you like the simplistic design.
